China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 1 月 15 日星期一 03:12:01 GMT 120
Exclusive: China's military and government acquire Nvidia chips despite U.S. banThe graphic processing units built by Nvidia are seen as superior to rival products for AI work as they can more efficiently process huge amounts of data needed for machine-learning tasks. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 23:08:59 GMT CJXN6OTESNJY7C47ELL7THEO5SY https://www.reuters.com/technology/chinese-military-government-acquire-nvidia-chips-despite-us-ban-2024-01-14/Eduardo Baptista技术
Russia's ally China needed to end Ukraine war, Swiss diplomat saysUkraine pushed ahead with its peace formula to end nearly two years of war with Russia with a meeting of national security advisers from around the world at the World Economic Forum in Davos. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 12:13:55 GMT VH7SAKGHXBMLXCZMPMWP6PUE5M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/top-diplomats-meet-davos-ukraine-peace-formula-2024-01-14/Victoria Waldersee世界欧洲
China's diplomats condemn foreign governments over Taiwan post-election remarksChina's foreign ministry and its embassies around the world condemned foreign governments that congratulated Taiwan's Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) and its president-elect Lai Ching-te after an election on Saturday. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 07:56:59 GMT VFDBZ6AZOZLQFFBOOKJKLRQ66HQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinese-embassies-condemn-foreign-officials-over-taiwan-post-election-remarks-2024-01-14/Eduardo Baptista世界亚太地区
Taiwan's new president faces tough time with China pressure, no majorityLai Ching-te won by a comfortable margin though with less than half the vote, but his party lost control of parliament on which the president-elect will have to rely to pass legislation and spending. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 06:20:44 GMT 4A5R4DRA35MQDDNS4FYVJJUTNM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-new-president-faces-tough-time-with-china-Pressure-no-parliament-2024-01-14/Yimou Lee, Sarah Wu, James Pomfret世界亚太地区
China opposes Japan's congratulatory message to Taiwan president-electThe Chinese embassy in Japan said on Sunday that it "resolutely opposed" Japanese Foreign Minister Yoko Kamikawa's statement congratulating Taiwan's new president-elect Lai Ching-te. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 04:19:52 GMT 5VL3BZEA4BKTTN5NDUXAAQ7WT4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-opposes-japan-congratulatory-message-taiwan-president-elect-2024-01-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
Lai Ching-te, Taiwan's new president-elect, will face China's ireLai repeatedly said during the campaign that he wanted to keep the status quo with China, and offered to talk to Beijing. But in Beijing's view, he is a separatist and a "troublemaker through and through." Sat, 13 Jan 2024 13:18:27 GMT 3KBOGC3XAZJUZIO6Z2Q3LZZI3M https://www.reuters.com/world/china/taiwan-president-elect-lai-face-china-ire-after-victory-2024-01-13/Ben Blanchard世界中国
Tibet not in focus, repression persists: Exiled former leaderThe plight of Tibet has become less discussed internationally but repression continues and China is applying what it did there to other regions, a former head of the Tibetan government-in-exile said on Saturday. Sat, 13 Jan 2024 07:22:27 GMT E2VHGST3EBMFBLI7KVZRJSGSVY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/tibetan-issues-not-focus-repression-persists-exiled-former-leader-2024-01-13/Reuters世界亚太地区
Blinken discusses human rights, Taiwan Strait with Chinese officialU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken on Friday raised concerns over China's human rights issues in a meeting with senior Chinese official Liu Jianchao in Washington, the State Department said, adding they also discussed "maintaining peace and stability" in the Taiwan Strait. Sat, 13 Jan 2024 00:50:23 GMT 3EHDGKEU2JMPFHCTUW2UB4D7GY https://www.reuters.com/world/blinken-raises- human-rights-issues-meeting-with-senior-chinese-official-2024-01-13/Kanishka Singh世界
Taiwan voters rebuff China, ruling party gets third presidential termLai Ching-te's party, which champions Taiwan's separate identity and rejects China's territorial claims, was seeking a third term. Beijing framed the elections as a choice between war and peace. Sat, 13 Jan 2024 00:06:20 GMT KNSNU4B6A5OSXG5Q63SITRAPWQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/polls-open-taiwan-ritic-elections-watched-closely-by-china-2024-01-13/Yimou Lee, Sarah Wu世界亚太地区
China urges better financing coordination for housing sectorChina's housing ministry and financial regulator asked local governments to better coordinate with financial institutions to provide financing support to real estate projects, as policymakers work to revive the sluggish housing market. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 12:40:54 GMT FAFZLMFKKRO6LPJ6TCO7PTNNHA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-urges-better-financing-coordination-housing-sector-2024-01-12/Reuters世界中国
China's 2023 bank lending at record high, but economy still strugglingNew bank lending in China rose less than expected in December, but 2023 lending hit a new record as the central bank kept policy accommodative to support an unexpectedly shaky economic recovery. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 11:26:26 GMT B26ZCDHZ3FKGTKLJVXURHTWL5Y https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/chinas-2023-bank-lending-record-high-economy-still-struggling-2024-01-12/Judy Hua, Kevin Yao市场亚洲市场
